did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: State Records Center - Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There is one item that has been reestricted due to legally required privacy protection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The item is restricted in accordance with 2.2-3705.5;32.127.1:03.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Highland County (Va.) Miscellaneous Records, 1847-1968 bulk 1858-1929. Local government records collection, Highland County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These records came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers Highland County, Va.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Highland County was named for its mountainous terrain. It was formed from Bath and Pendleton (West Virginia) Counties in 1847.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Highland County (Va.) Miscellaneous Records, 1847-1968 bulk 1858-1929 these records include the following; Circuit Court Conditional Sales Memorandum, Commissions for Insanity Reports (including Albemarle County), Contracts and Agreements, Estray Bonds, and Mechanic Liens.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Highland County records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm.

controlaccess.head: Genre and Form Terms:
controlaccess.genreform: Local government records -- Virginia -- Highland County
